channel.title: Mortgage rates on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Mortgage rates on FinanClub

item.title: US Mortgage Applications for Purchases Drop for a Fourth Week
item.description: US mortgage applications for home purchases fell for a fourth straight week in the week ended June 2, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association (MBA). The MBA’s index of mortgage applications for home purchases fell 1.7% from the previous week, to 151.

item.title: Housing Market Is Beginning to Tilt in Favor of Renters
item.description: The housing market is beginning to tilt in favor of renters, as rising home prices and mortgage rates make it more expensive to buy a home. The trend is being driven by a number of factors, including: The COVID-19 pandemic, which has led to a decline in the supply of homes for sale.
